abstract: Google was not at all prepared for its moment to become a hardware company overnight. You call HTC for hardware questions, Google for software questions, T-Mobile for cell-service questions.
snippet: Google was not at all prepared for its moment to become a hardware company overnight. You call HTC for hardware questions, Google for software questions, T-Mobile for cell-service questions.
lead_paragraph: David Pogue says that Google is imposing an early termination fee for people who cancel service with the phone — in addition to any early termination fee that the carrier would impose.

headline.main: The Fine Print Behind Google’s Nexus One
